author: vischia
body:
This PR replaces SCAL access with TCDS access for the Strips offline code.

SCAL access is left as a fallback in case TCDS access fails.

The request is documented at https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSTRACK-166

# Tests:
I checked by adding printouts that the numerical values extracted from TCDSRecord are exactly the same as those extracted from L1ABC.
Some of these printouts are documented in https://github.com/vischia/cmssw/commit/73b5972c6af3d75cd235a9485e82b0d51fbc7d91

This is my first official PR to CMSSW and my first work on SiStrip; I tried to avoid bad practices (e.g. white lines addition/removal; I left only those which imho improve the logical readability of the code), I apologize in advance if there is something still not OK.

# Notes

- The bxoffset is defined as "eventBx - l1abcBx" in one module, and "l1abcBx - eventBx" in the other module. Since I have no idea of whether this is OK, I left it as it is, and I maintained this difference of conventions in the TCDS portion of the code.

Cheers,
Pietro
title: Strips Offline code: TCDS-Scal migration
